function.name: cleaning_start
function.description: This function is used to start cleaning a specified area with a robot vacuum cleaner.

location.description: The location where the device is located. e.g. home, office, etc.

room.description: The room where the device is located.  e.g. living room, bedroom, bathroom, etc.

device.description: The name or type of the device to be used for cleaning.

rvcLocations.description: The list of locations to be cleaned. e.g. living room, bedroom, etc.

rvcObjects.description: The list of objects, near to which cleaning needs to be done. e.g. AC, TV, washing machine, etc.

mode.description: The cleaning mode to be used.
